Cost_of_Living_Index_by_Country_2024.csv.Document_Title: Cost of Living Index by Country (2024)
Cost_of_Living_Index_by_Country_2024.csv.Document_Description: This dataset provides cost of living, rent, groceries, and other indices for countries in 2024.

countries of the world.csv.Document_Description: Comprehensive demographic, geographic, and economic indicators for countries worldwide.

country_vaccinations.csv.Document_Description: Vaccination data including total doses, daily vaccinations, and per-hundred metrics across countries.

country_wise_latest.csv.Document_Description: Latest reported confirmed cases, deaths, recoveries, and related rates by country.

country-wise-average.csv.Document_Description: Aggregated health and nutrition indicators (wasting, stunting, overweight) by country.

Country.csv.Document_Description: Basic ISO codes, region, income group, currency, and other metadata for countries.

fifa_ranking.csv.Document_Description: Historical FIFA rankings, points, and confederation details for global football teams.

Final.csv.Document_Description: Cellular subscription, broadband subscription, internet usage, and related data by country over time.

GCB2022v27_MtCO2_flat.csv.Document_Description: Fossil CO2 emissions (total, coal, oil, gas, cement, flaring), per capita, and year for countries.

global air pollution dataset.csv.Document_Description: AQI metrics (PM2.5, PM10, CO, Ozone, NO2), categories, and city-level air quality info across countries.

global-data-on-sustainable-energy (1).cs.Document_Description: Electricity generation from renewables, fossil fuels, cooking fuel access, and other energy indicators.

GlobalWeatherRepository.csv.Document_Description: Up-to-date temperature, humidity, air quality, and meteorological data for global locations.

Life Expectancy Data.csv.Document_Description: Life expectancy, adult mortality, infant deaths, health expenditure, and socioeconomic factors by country.

Petrol Dataset June 20 2022.csv.Document_Description: Global or regional petrol pricing information as of June 20, 2022 (some read/encoding issues).

population_by_country_2020.csv.Document_Description: Yearly population, net change, density, land area, and related demographic info for countries in 2020.

raw_data.csv.Document_Description: Total COVID cases, deaths, stringency index, and GDP or population info by date and country.

wfp_market_food_prices.csv.Document_Description: Market prices for various food commodities across countries (some encoding issues).

who_suicide_statistics.csv.Document_Description: Country-level suicide counts by year, age group, and sex, with population references.

world-data-2023.csv.Document_Description: Varied metrics including population, land use, CO2 emissions, health expenditure, and tax info for 2023.

world-happiness-report-2019.csv.Document_Description: Happiness scores, ladder indices, social support, and other metrics as of 2019.

world-happiness-report-2021.csv.Document_Description: Happiness ladder scores, freedom, corruption perception, and GDP indicators for 2021.
